statements: SELECT user_id, username, role FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE role = 'doctor';
SELECT user_id, role FROM users WHERE role IN ('doctor', 'patient') ORDER BY role ASC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'D%' AND role = 'patient';
SELECT user_id, username, role FROM users WHERE role='admin';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username='john_doe';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE role='doctor' ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT username, password_hash FROM users WHERE password_hash LIKE '%123';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE role IN ('admin', 'doctor') ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, password_hash FROM users WHERE user_id = '123456';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'johndoe';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE password_hash = 'password123';
SELECT role_id, user_id, role_name FROM user_roles ORDER BY role_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_id, username, password_hash FROM users WHERE username LIKE '%_smith%' ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT users.user_id, users.username, user_roles.role_name FROM users INNER JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id WHERE users.username = 'jane_doe';
SELECT user_id, username, password_hash FROM users WHERE password_hash IS NOT NULL AND user_id NOT IN (SELECT user_id FROM user_roles WHERE role_name = 'admin') ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM permissions ORDER BY permission_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, permission_id FROM user_permissions WHERE permission_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT user_id, username, created_at FROM users ORDER BY created_at DESC;

SELECT users.username, permissions.permission_name FROM users JOIN user_permissions ON users.user_id = user_permissions.user_id JOIN permissions ON permissions.permission_id = user_permissions.permission_id;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(permission_id) AS num_permissions FROM user_permissions GROUP BY user_id HAVING num_permissions > 1;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM user_roles ORDER BY role_name DESC;
SELECT role_name, COUNT(*) FROM user_roles GROUP BY role_name;
SELECT u.username, r.role_name, p.permission_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles r ON u.user_id = r.role_id JOIN user_permissions p ON r.role_id = p.permission_id;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, role_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.role_id;
SELECT user_id, username, permission_name FROM users JOIN user_permissions ON users.user_id = user_permissions.permission_id ORDER BY username ASC, permission_name DESC;

SELECT user_id, username, role_name, permission_name FROM users JOIN user_role_permissions ON users.user_id = user_role_permissions.role_id JOIN user_permissions ON user_role_permissions.permission_id = user_permissions.permission_id;
SELECT * FROM Users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM Users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT doctor_id, specialty FROM Doctors WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT appointment_date, status FROM Appointments WHERE appointment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM Users WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT doctor_id, name, specialty FROM Doctors ORDER BY doctor_id DESC;
SELECT appointment_date, status FROM Appointments WHERE appointment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT u.username, p.name, a.appointment_date FROM Users u JOIN Patients p ON u.user_id = p.user_id JOIN Appointments a ON p.patient_id = a.patient_id ORDER BY a.appointment_date ASC;
